reviewText: For me this is a trip down nostalgia lane. I grew up watching Joe "I'm a cop" Friday. That said, it was a simpler time and the plots are pretty simple. Also it's b&w so that will require some patience. And, most of these serials from the 50's and 60's were only half an hour. Take out a few minutes for commercials and you have about a 23-24 minute drama that moves pretty fast to get where it's going.
